author: baranda
msg: Updated sandbox examples build to be able to build the war file with MyFaces or JSF-RI. Adapted the nightly build script so the sources bundle for the sandbox always contains myfaces. Updated sandbox core pom to use the 1.1.4-SNAPSHOTS.
In the examples sandbox home page, the information about the build and the implementation used is shown.
